A B E G I L M R S

A

addExcludeFilter(TypeFilter) - Method in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Adds an exclusion filter.
addIncludeFilter(TypeFilter) - Method in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Adds an inclusion filter.
au.com.permeance.liferay.spring - package au.com.permeance.liferay.spring
This package contains a number of integration classes easing the development process when building Spring portlets on top of liferay.

B

beanLocator - Variable in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Stores the liferay bean locator to copy beans from.
BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier - Class in au.com.permeance.liferay.spring
This class provides a bean which registers existing liferay beans obtained from liferay's BeanLocator in the Spring ApplicationContext in which the instance of this class is defined.
BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier(BeanLocator) - Constructor for class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Creates a new instance based on the supplied bean locator.

E

excludeFilters - Variable in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Stores the list of bean exclusions.

G

getAnnotationMetadata() - Method in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.SimpleMetadataReader
getClassMetadata() - Method in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.SimpleMetadataReader
getResource() - Method in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.SimpleMetadataReader

I

includeFilters - Variable in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Stores the list of bean inclusions.
initApplicationContext(ApplicationContext) - Method in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Initialises the supplied application context based on the BeanLocator associated with this instance by iterating the liferay registered beans (via BeanLocator.getNames()).
isAcceptable(String) - Method in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Determines whether the class identified by the supplied string is acceptable for copying by this instance.

L

LOG - Static variable in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Logger for this class.

M

matches(Collection<? extends TypeFilter>, Class<?>) - Method in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Checks whether the supplied class matches any of the supplied type filters, returning true if it does, false otherwise.

R

requiredContextClass() - Method in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier

S

safeForName(String) - Method in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Wraps a call to Class.forName(String) so that any ClassNotFoundException is logged rather than propagating back up the call stack.
safeLocate(String) - Method in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Calls BeanLocator.locate(String) on the beanLocator associated with this instance, catching and logging any BeanLocatorException which is thrown.
safeMatch(TypeFilter, MetadataReader) - Method in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.BeanLocatorDefinitionCopier
Wraps a call to TypeFilter.match(MetadataReader, org.springframework.core.type.classreading.MetadataReaderFactory) so that any IOException is logged rather than propagating up the call stack.
SimpleMetadataReader - Class in au.com.permeance.liferay.spring
This class provides an implementation of the MetadataReader interface which reads from an already materialised class (rather than a resource or stream).
SimpleMetadataReader(Class<?>) - Constructor for class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.SimpleMetadataReader
Creates a new instance, based on the supplied class.
standardAnnotationMetadata - Variable in class au.com.permeance.liferay.spring.SimpleMetadataReader
Stores the metadata for the class supplied in the constructor.
